instructions: From any Home screen, tap the All apps icon. Scroll to and tap the Settings icon. Scroll down to DEVICE , then tap Apps . Verify the All tab is selected. Find and touch the desired application. Tap Clear Cache and Clear Data .

From any Home screen, tap Apps . Scroll to and tap Play Store . Tap My apps . To keep your apps automatically updated, tap the Menu key, tap Settings , and then tap Auto-update apps to select your preference. Perform one of the following actions: Tap Update [x] to update all applications with updates available. Select an individual application, and then tap Update to update.

From any Home screen, tap the All apps icon. Scroll to and tap the Settings icon. Scroll down to DEVICE , then tap Apps . Verify the All tab is selected. Find and touch the desired application. Tap Uninstall .

From any Home screen, tap Messages . Tap the MORE in the top right. Tap Settings from the drop-down menu. Scroll to and tap Emergency alerts . Tap Emergency alerts to set which alert types to receive. Select or clear the check boxes for: Presidential alerts Imminent extreme alert Imminent severe alert AMBER alerts

From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Email . Tap the Menu key in the top right of the screen. Tap Settings . Tap Manage accounts . Tap your email address until it advances to the next screen, Scroll to 'NOTIFICATION SETTINGS'. Tap Email notifications to select or clear the check box and turn on/off email notifications. Tap Notification sound to select or change the notification sound. Tap Vibrate to select or clear the check box and turn on or turn off vibrate notification.

From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Under 'Device,' tap Sounds and notifications . Under 'Sound,' tap Ringtones and sounds . Tap Ringtone and select the desired ringtone. Tap the back arrow in the upper left corner, the selection is automatically saved.
From any Home screen, tap Contacts . Tap the desired contact. Tap the Edit icon (pencil). Tap Ringtone . Tap the desired ringtone to assign it to the contact and then tap OK . Tap Save .
